CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 3, 1955, pg. 6 reads: "Inventor - Nathaniel Gardner of 208 East Stockton Street, North Side, displays his invention - an alarm to prevent mail thefts. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Nathaniel Gardner wearing short sleeved paisley shirt, holding mailbox alarm invention, in interior with potted plant patterned wallpaper
